scripts.server-start: export DEBUG=server,postgresql && npm run build && nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.start: export DEBUG=server,postgresql && concurrently -n 'POSTGRES,SERVER' -c 'bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold' 'npm run docker-postgres' 'npm run server-start'
scripts.docker-postgres: dotenv -- cross-var docker run -d -p %POSTGRES_PORT%:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB=%POSTGRES_DB% -e POSTGRES_USER=%POSTGRES_USER% -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=%POSTGRES_PASSWORD% -v %POSTGRES_LOCAL_DATA_VOLUME%:/var/lib/postgresql/data --name postgresql_local postgres:%POSTGRES_TAG%
